snippet: More than $100,000 in donations has poured into a tiny home heating firm in Maine after The Times wrote about the company's attempts to provide oil to customers who are unable to pay.
abstract: More than $100,000 in donations has poured into a tiny home heating firm in Maine after The Times wrote about the company's attempts to provide oil to customers who are unable to pay.

headline.main: Article Prompts Donations to Maine Oil Company
